relationships.description: Harry throws a rubbish bag over Ron's head.
Fred apparates into the scene with George.
Harry reads a book written by Miranda Goshawk.
Harry reads a book written by Wilbert Slinkhard.
Fred speaks to George in the scene.
George informs Harry that Dumbledore has found a new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher.
